Plot: A local barber in a small Serbian village comes up with an idea to erect a monument to Michael Jackson to attract tourists from around the world. Some locals like the idea others do not. And then we take a special Balkan ride.
Title: Monument to Michael Jackson
Country: Serbia, Germany, Republic of Macedonia, Croatia, France
Actors: Boris Milivojevic, Branislav Trifunovic, Toni Mihajlovski, Natasa Tapuskovic
